Synopsis: 
Ben Mears, a successful novelist, returns home to Salem&#039;s Lot after many years away and is immediately drawn back to the sinister Marsten House where he had a particularly nasty episode as a child. The house has now been bought by an antiques dealer, Straker, and his mysterious partner, Mr Barlow. When locals start disappearing then returning as vampires, Mears begins to suspect that Barlow and Straker are a lot more than they seem.
